name: apple-health
description: Connect your iPhone and Apple Watch to your bot for sleep, HRV, readiness, activity, and vitals. Uses the free Health Auto Export app as a bridge. Works standalone or alongside Oura Ring. Includes a Health Agent for biometric insights, medication lookups, and symptom guidance.
author: tk-47
postInstall: Open prompt.md in Claude Code and say: "Set up Apple Watch health integration"
